Package jchess.gamelogic

Class RuleAgent

java.lang.Object
jchess.gamelogic.RuleAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
jchess.common.IRule, jchess.common.IRuleAgent
public class RuleAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements jchess.common.IRuleAgent
This class is responsible to manage underlying "Rule" (only) related data. It keeps the state of the Rule and ensures validity and expiry of the Rule.
Since:
7 Dec 2019
Author:
Sajad Karim
